statements: DELETE FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 1 AND participant_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM participants WHERE participant_name LIKE 'J%' AND participant_age > 30;
DELETE FROM participant WHERE participant_id = 100 AND age > 25;
DELETE FROM race_category WHERE difficulty = 'Advanced' AND distance > 10.0;
DELETE FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 10 AND age < 30;
DELETE FROM race_categories WHERE race_id = 2 AND max_participants < 50;
DELETE FROM registrations WHERE participant_id = 1 AND race_id = 3;
DELETE FROM results WHERE race_id = 5 AND finish_time < '09:00:00';
